name: Glitch Hitch
description:
In this game you have to avoid the enemy glitches that have appeared and reset the world to save it, before they take over!
If they hit you, you're in for a surprise.

We made this for the GMTK game jam 2020.
Link to original GMTK submission:
https://ischaw.itch.io/glitch-hitch

*Because of Problems with Unity and GitHub we had to reupload it on another page, apologies for the inconvenience.

Made By:
- 3D Models by Shanice de Jong
- Texturing by Ischa Westerveld
- Level Design by Ischa Westerveld
- UI by Shanice de Jong & Inger Smit
- Programming by Inger Smit & Swan Chase

Music  
Cut and Run by Kevin MacLeod Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3576-cut-and-run
